module.name: Call Flow Control
module.description: Call Flow manual toggle control - allows for two destinations to be chosen and provides a feature code that toggles between the two destinations.
module.changelog: *15.0.12* Packaging of ver 15.0.12 *15.0.11* Related to FREEPBX-20414: removed $jobid from runRestore() *15.0.10* Fixes class not found error in REST API (FREEPBX-20521) *15.0.9* FREEPBX-20067 Improve code astdb *15.0.8* FREEPBX-20067 Fixe backup issue. *15.0.6* fixing legacy restore *15.0.5* backup and restore *15.0.4* FREEPBX-18133 Revert post handling from request helper *15.0.3* Rest Api *15.0.2* Packaging of ver 15.0.2 *15.0.1* Impliment backup
